item.description:
Join us in January, February and March for Whimsical Winter Warmers!

Get out of the cold and join other small or toy breed four legged friends to socialize and excersize in an off-leash safe indoor/outdoor environment.

A few notes:

  • Cash only please.
  • The health and safety of our furry friends is our top priority. Please be sure that your doggie(s) are current on their vaccinations including bordatella, DHLPP and rabies.
  • Dogs MUST be spayed or neutered if over 7 months
  • Dogs must be 20lbs or less
  • We reserve the right to ask a dog to leave who may be too aggressive or appears sick.
  • We ask that owners pick up after their own dog.
  • Questions? Contact Emily at emily@offtheleashddc.com

    TIME:7:00 â€“ 8:00pm

    COST:
    One Doggie - $5
    Two or more doggies - $8

    RSVP:
    www.meetup.com
    The North Attleboro Small Breed Dogs Meetup Group

group.name: The North Attleboro Small Breed Dogs Meetup Group

item.name: Whimsical Winter Warmers
